solution_line_template: The classes in the pack cost ${avg_class_price} each because {pack_price} / {pack_classes} = <<{pack_price}/{pack_classes}={avg_class_price}>>{avg_class_price}

An additional class costs ${additional_class_price} because {avg_class_price} x (1 +({additional_class_increase})) = <<{avg_class_price}*(1+({additional_class_increase}))={additional_class_price}>>{additional_class_price}
Her three additional classes cost ${extra_classes_cost} because {extra_classes} x {additional_class_price} = <<{extra_classes}*{additional_class_price}={extra_classes_cost}>>{extra_classes_cost}
